name: Gory Christmas
overview: A Digital Ninja Christmas Special! A Christmas game for 2 to 4 players by Lee Bamber and released in 1994. This is not a violent game, nor is it horrific, terrifying, obscene, shocking or sickening. It's a game of the mind. If you are easily offended, the kids being sliced apart, crushed, kicked, thrown, maimed, stabbed and murdered are mere actors, playing a well-performed scene for your enjoyment. To the rest of us, it's a chance to release all those daily seasonal tensions. And for the minority who have no worries, it's a fast-paced, sadistic blood riot! Collect the grisly presents that Santa drops...and you can only hold 1 at a time...so you auto drop the one were holding when you pick up a new one. And know that Santa doesn't always drop the same pressies every round, so just keep collecting presents until you get the one you wanted.
